description: ViewHDintroduces the OPTIMAL ALL to HDMI converter switch, in a well made metal jacket. THE ONE Video/Audio converter switch you ever need to best manage all your various audio and video sources together from legacy analog AV to 3D HDMI with SURROUND SOUND Capability.Please connect the HDMI output to the HDMI input of the TV directly.Features- 8 inputs to 1 HDMI output multi-function video / audio switch.- Inputs contains 2x YPbPR / Component Video, 2x AV, 1x VGA, 3x HDMI- Allows display to view any 1 of the 8 sources-EDID Manipulation Feature to Support 2CH, 5.1/6CH or 7.1/8CH Sound from HDMI inputs for 1080P TVs. (Applicable to NEWER 720P TV that can accept 1080P signal)- Supports input formats from 480i/p, 576/p, 720P, 1080i to 1080P with 3D- Automatically upscales 480i and 576i to 480P and 576P from component and AV inputs- HDMI v1.3, supports HDMI v1.4 3D (Does NOT support Ethernet and Audio Return Channel in v1.4)- Delivers uncompressed digital video without signal loss- Dual switching modes: IR Remote or Manual Button on the Unit- Support HDMI output cable length Up-to 15m AWG26- Support VGA input format: 800x600, 1024x768, 1280x1024, 1440 x900, 1400 x1050, 1600 x1200, 1920 x1080, 1920 x1200; all at 60Hz.- 7.75"Lx2.8"Wx1.6"HPackage Includes1. Main Unit 8x12. 5VDC Power Adapter 100-240V3. Remote Control4. IR Sensor (enable you to hide the switch while still be able to control it with remote )5. Metal mounting brackets6. User ManualViewHDone year warranty.Note: If you don't get the right video/audio, please make sure to use the "auto-copy" button on the remote, and for analog inputs, turn off the display unit and then turn it back on should fix no video problem.USPS Shipping.
title: ViewHD Multi-functional HDMI Converter Switch 8 Inputs to One HDMI Output Support 3D and Surround Sound for 1080P HDTV
